Package etomica.virial

Class MeterVirialBDBin

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.virial.MeterVirialBDBin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction

    public class MeterVirialBDBin
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction
    Measures value of clusters in a box and returns the values divided by the sampling bias from the sampling cluster.
